entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming east 30 km/h early this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending before morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
